column4: I'm new to ubuntu and I am trying to install it on a box that has windows already on it. it has two disks and I want to put ubuntu on the second disk and dual  boot
should be no problem - you'llneed to configure "grub" afterward
thanks, I am going through the install wizzard and I don't want to delete my windows partition, how do I prepare the disk space
you need to look at the second device, which is probably /dev/sdb
